Loader.text: The party you have been waiting for is finally here

Rsvp.text: Please let us know if you'll be able to join us by clicking on the RSVP button here on the side and filling in the form by February 15th, 2025.

question1.question: What's the dress code?
question1.answer: Come comfortable, elegant, and colorful! Shoes that love the grass are more than welcome. What's important is to feel good and classy. Either way, definitely dress like you're ready to party!

question2.question: Are children invited?
question2.answer: If they promise not to cry... just kidding. We have no minimum or maximum age limits—everyone's welcome to join the fun. We won't have childcare set up, though, so please plan accordingly.

question3.question: How can I get to Casa Amarela?
question3.answer: Uber gets there! And, as we get closer to the date and know how many people will be in town for the party, we'll see if we can arrange a shuttle service. If you're coming by car, please park on the main road and walk to the gate—we'll make sure to illuminate the area for you.

Playlist.title: Playlist
Playlist.text: Enjoy the playlist your family & friends specially curated for you
